mapper.select: Select Fac_ID, Fac_Name, BIZ_NUM, Fac_Type, FAC_ADDR, FAC_ADDR_DETAIL, Fac_Web, FAC_INTRO, REP_NAME, REP_PHONE, FI.FILE_PATH, (Select nvl(Sum(T1.Don_Amt),0 ) From Don_Ledger T1 Left Join Donation T2 On T1.Don_Id= T2.Don_Id Where T2.Fac_Id='toyFacility') As donaitonAmt, (Select Count(Distinct(T1.Mem_Id)) From Don_Ledger T1 Left Join Donation T2 On T1.Don_Id= T2.Don_Id Where T2.Fac_Id='toyFacility') As donors From Facility F LEFT JOIN FILES FI ON F.FAC_ID = FI.CODE_USER Where Fac_Id=#{facId} AND FI.CODE='p02'
